title: News: The Knife Drop a Mysterious New Video
content:
The Knife have posted a cryptic new video on their website that hints at the possibility of a new album in 2013. It features;

  1. Feet
  2. A woman
  3. A woman on a swing
  4. A party

Head over to their website to watch or stream it below. I’d love to bore you with my analysis but I’m off to work. Omg sad face. As always, more when we get it.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
